title: Question:
author: LuckySea
content: I would like to gather your opinions and preferences regarding online casino promotions.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I like 100% welcome bonus. With this type of bonus, it is not that gambling site has gotten plenty money from me and give me bonus in a way they know that they are not losing but giving me bonus from what I have already lost to gamble with it again. I am not the bonus type, I do not think of bonus at all, I just gamble and have the fun. I hardly gamble, and only during weekends.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: The only bonus I like is the monthly bonus which in here fits to the other and so I am specifying it here.This is a bonus that most casinos,I mean well reputable casinos like Stake gives every month to their loyal customers/gamblers and it happens also to be the most substantial bonus compared to all other kind of bonuses like free spins,weekly bonus,welcome bonus because it is a recurring one and as I said a substantial one.I look forward only to that type of bonus although I am also entitled to the weekly bonus as it is bigger as I said,so this is my vote here.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: I have tried several promotions in different casinos but what I truly enjoy are Tournaments and Competitions with certain conditions in mind. First , I prefer competitions that aren't only determined by who wagers the most money because it basically favors those who already have a significant amount of money. For exemple, someone with a million dollars wouldn't be thrilled to win just $1,000 or even less.Secondly, competitions offering prizes that require you to wager them 10x or more don't feel like true prizes to me, but kind of a deposit bonus that you will have to risk even more.Tournaments and competitions create good competition among players and aren't solely reliant on luck or the size of funds someone has. They often require strategies, good thinking and there are various types, including sports betting and achieving the highest multiplier….etc

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: I voted for Cashback offers. It will be interesting to see what will it be, I like to see more of daily cashbacks and obviously big % too. Specially this is good if let's say that you are in a losing streak and doesn't want to deposit more money. So in turn you can used this cashbacks to at least continue to have your gambling session and see if it can break your streak or not.Of course, there are some minimum amounts that you have to deposit before you could take advantage of it. But I guess if you are really into gambling, casinos should have this kind of promotions to give back to their customers and so that they will continue to play on their platform with this cashback promotions.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: QuoteWelcome BonusesMost of the time, welcome bonuses is the same as deposit bonus where players need to make deposit in order to take the welcome bonus. It comes with high wagering requirement as well, so as a gambler, I will not consider welcome bonuses as a good bonus.QuoteFree Spins   Depending on what kind of free spins and its wagering requirement. Is it free spins with deposit requirement or is it free spins that given to players after the players wager specific amount or is it a completely free spins given to players without deposit? QuoteReload BonusesThis one is usually the same as deposit bonus, I do not think it is good bonus as well. QuoteCashback OffersAs small player I will prefer to get rakeback than cashback, because rakeback is counted based on how much I have wagered while cashback is usually based on how much I've lost. QuoteLoyalty ProgramsToo many type of loyalty programs, and above mentioned bonuses can be under loyalty program. What kind of loyalty program you are referring to? QuoteTournaments and CompetitionsAgain it is depending on what kind of tournament or competition you are referring to but you as owner of a casino should provide regular tournaments such as wagering contest, multiplier contest or any other contest to give a reason for your players to stay as long as possible in your casino.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on October 30, 2023, 08:15:33 AMI like 100% welcome bonus. With this type of bonus, it is not that gambling site has gotten plenty money from me and give me bonus in a way they know that they are not losing but giving me bonus from what I have already lost to gamble with it again. I am not the bonus type, I do not think of bonus at all, I just gamble and have the fun. I hardly gamble, and only during weekends.I hardly make any withdrawal from welcome bonuses, and I am not a lone in that. I don't know if it is a psychological thing, but I tend to be too reckless with bonuses and easily waste them away without any form of caution. Therefore, my choice is loyalty programs. With a loyalty program in place, there will always be incentives for joining and helping the online casino grow. It gives a sense of ownership because if the casino succeeds, the users will, so it is a win-win for everybody.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Odohu on October 30, 2023, 10:22:46 AMI hardly make any withdrawal from welcome bonuses, and I am not a lone in that. I don't know if it is a psychological thing, but I tend to be too reckless with bonuses and easily waste them away without any form of caution. Therefore, my choice is loyalty programs. But I don't know of a casino that will allow you withdraw bonus that they gave to you either as a new comer to taste and wager or spin to have a feel of how it is with your real deposit.That is what I like about bonus, it helps you taste the casino website to navigate around it and really I like when the bonus wager is not limited to just certain areas.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: I don't like offer with 40-50x waggering.I more preffer a loyalty-program similiar like (Stake) but for right now, we don't have any casino who can compete a bonus like (Stake). While they shared so much money from:- Post Monthyl- Montly- Weekly- Stream rewardAnd other, still stake is the highest give you a bonus.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: LuckySea on October 30, 2023, 08:09:35 AMI would like to gather your opinions and preferences regarding online casino promotions.    -  Maybe for me, the welcome bonus is a strong attraction to attract more customers to play in their casino, because I see that the amount deposited is also the amount they will give to your balance using their casino.There are other casinos where, when you deposit, even if it's only around 20–30 dollars, you have a welcome bonus that you can get from the casino, which is around 125 dollars, if I'm not mistaken. So a lot of people will be dazzled by a welcome bonus like that. I just can't remember which online casino I saw that at.

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: What I like the most is a Free Spin without any deposit requirement and without any wagering requirements, allowing me to withdraw the winnings from the free spin.I tried accessing your website using a VPN because I can't access it without using VPN. It was a good experience, even though I didn't win the free spin promotion. Hopefully, you can also offer promotions exclusively for the BitcoinTalk community.Welcome to BitcoinTalk community.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Cashback offers are definitely my choice. Welcome bonuses can be received only once but cashback offers or rakeback will be there forever as long as you can keep on gambling and wager. There are times that I only use $10 but I can make a wager up to $100 - $200. I know in cashback you can only get a small percentage of the wagered amount but still that is free money after enjoying yourself at any game that you played. If a gambler could somehow lengthen his playing time by not losing then he will probably get more in the cashback system although I doubt that will happen. Anyway, it's still a good thing that we can receive money from just playing around and it's a win-win situation for both small bettors and big ones unlike other promotions that is only relying in how much was deposited.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: I like everything from numbers 1 to 4. But what I don't like is that casinos often have very high wagering requirements, so that doesn't appeal to me. But if there weren't any wagering requirements, everything would attract the interest of gamblers.Apart from that, there will be a request to carry out KYC when gamblers want to withdraw their winnings. We know that some gamblers are very lucky in this regard, allowing them to get their big winnings.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Welcome bonuses and free spins usually attract new users to test and give it a try and it is a fact that many like the casino promotions of both but for old users it may not seem attractive to both promotions and prefer Loyalty Programs, for me they are just promotions sometimes personally I just play to test the games and the casino does not place importance on bonuses and free spins as long as the site is fun to test, that is more than enoughI'm sure the poll that will be more popular are welcome bonuses and free spins, I have many beginner friends who are very happy to test the game on every online casino site that has a welcome bonus promotion and free spins because according to them it can increase the duration of time they spend gambling there. long and add extra money too. I'm also sure everyone has different views of course so this thread will be full of many variations of what they are interested in from casino promotions and it's not always the same.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: I vote Other, I refer to happy hour aka 0% odds in slots or in house games which make me as a gambler and the house has a same chance to win or lose. I also like odds boost if I bet in sports, I can take advantage over it and earn more money.Welcome bonus and free spins has roll over requirement.Reload bonus, cashback, and royalty program aren't really worth. While tournament and competition, I can't beat the high roller.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: LuckySea on October 30, 2023, 08:09:35 AMI would like to gather your opinions and preferences regarding online casino promotions.Since the casinos are having a target to meet through engaging the gamblers in making promotion for them, they should also consider the gamblers by being honest and rewarding on every promotional efforts they give, a welcome bonus is what first attract gamblers which is also what helps them have a point is start, referral bonus as well is another form of promotions they like to participate in while gambling, these should be the main focus on each casinos when they are starting because everyone will be all in anticipation of what they've got to offer first.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Different promotions target different players, so each bonus has pros and cons.  New players probably like welcome bonuses and free spins more.  But to keep existing players happy, casinos should have good cashback offers and loyalty programs too.  Those give back a percentage of losses as bonus money or real cash.  Tournaments and competitions work for competitive types who want to win prizes by playing against others.  So what we like depends on how we gamble and what matters most to us at a casino and  personally, I don't look at bonuses and promotions too much when picking a place to play.  Some other things are more important to me.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Honestly, I am never attracted to bonuses in any way and sometimes I felt the wagering requirements to collect/claim bonuses are insane so I just go with what I want to bet and am happy to collect if anything falls on its own apart from that I am never deposited such amount to claim deposit bonus or bet any amount to be in the leaderboard rewards and so on.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: LuckySea on October 30, 2023, 08:09:35 AMI would like to gather your opinions and preferences regarding online casino promotions.Free spin and welcome bonus with low wagering requirements is the best casino promotion I really enjoy. I’m not a hardcore gambler which means rakeback and cashback is not my forte since I do bet minimal which means I only earn few of this rewards.The 2 bonus that I mention above gives me a goal on gambling to play more until I hit my target wagering requirements. I’m not always availing this kind of promotion but I will choose these 2 over others if the wagering requirements is reasonable. I often play without any promotion to focus on the game alone.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: The welcome bonus is usually for new users to experience a different casino, but this time I am different and don't like it because I have settled in a casino that has been playing there for a long time so the welcome bonus is not so interested at this time.Reload bonuses and cashback offers may be what is still interested depending on how much is wagered, and this is one that may be obtained for users who have remained at the old casino for this offer they will be at the casino that offers it.
